summary: The diff implements the requested single-page portfolio structure with dark theme styling and the required sections (Hero, Skills, Projects, Experience, Contact) plus responsive navigation and smooth scrolling. However, the required dashboard illustration is not evidenced as being rendered, and the presence of all required generated image files under the specified public assets path cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary. Additionally, Internet Identity/auth-related infrastructure and a promotional footer link were added despite being non-goals/not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Incorporate beautiful data-visualization-themed imagery throughout the page (e.g., hero background/illustration and project thumbnails) using locally bundled static assets.
missing_requirements.reason: Hero background and three project thumbnails are referenced, but the required dashboard illustration image (dashboard-illustration.dim_1200x800.png) is not shown as referenced or rendered anywhere in the visible diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add and render the generated images as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references images under /assets/generated/..., but the diff summary does not show the actual addition of the required image files under frontend/public/assets/generated (and two added files are omitted/truncated). Therefore existence of all required generated images cannot be verified from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider and actor-creation hooks added (auth-related plumbing)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists adding authentication flows (Internet Identity) as a non-goal unless requested; the portfolio is intended to be frontend-only/static.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes an external promotional attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any requirement; introduces additional external outbound marketing link beyond portfolio needs.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend Motoko actor file added (backend/main.mo) despite frontend-only preference
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest prefers frontend-only changes for this portfolio; no backend features were requested.
